## Installation

You can install the development version of CatastRoEus like so:

```{r install, eval = FALSE}
# Install 'CatastRoEus' in R:
install.packages("CatastRoEus",
  repos = c("https://ropenspain.r-universe.dev", "https://cloud.r-project.org")
)
```
